title: Annika Bryn
text:
Annika Bryn (born 1945) is a <a href="Sweden">Swedish</a> author and <a href="freelance">freelance</a> journalist. Bryn has written several <a href="short%20story">short stories</a> in magazines and freelance articles in newspapers, as well as two <a href="crime%20fiction">crime fiction</a> novels.
Bryn was born to a Swedish mother and a Norwegian father, active in the resistance against the <a href="German%20occupation%20of%20Norway%20in%20World%20War%20II">German occupation of Norway in World War II</a>. After divorce, the father moved to the United States and became a U.S. citizen.
